alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 6:24PM CDT until June 13 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... Western Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Central Cass County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Bowie County in northeastern Texas... Northern Morris County in northeastern Texas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 624 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Naples, or 20 miles southwest of New Boston, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Golfball size hail fell near Talco earlier with this storm. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Queen City, Naples, Omaha, Hosston, Rodessa, Ida, Bivins, Us 259 And I 30 Intersection, Ravanna, Brightstar, Bloomburg, Douglassville, Marietta, Domino, Red Hill, Bryans Mill, Fort Lynn and Kiblah. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
